description:
Husband and Wife Argument
Mr. Mizunuma is waiting for Mom`s work. It should be close to the deadline, yet he`s not edgy. It looks like it`s the early days of marriage - he`s worrying about a husband and wife argument. When Mom listens to his worries...
Cell Phone!
Chi got a cell phone and Bunji bugs Mom for one. He gets told that he`s too young and she doesn`t get him one. Meanwhile, Bunji and Chi send each other messages through Mom`s cell phone...
Sexy duo
While looking for cute clothes at a shopping mall, a young girl comes over and says "Sis, want to have debut with me?"  Mom wonders about it but Fumi thinks "it`s not bad" and gets excited...
Album
Dad and Mom are in the middle of arranging photos for albums. Bunji`s photos get sorted and he has two albums. On the other hand, Fumi has fewer photos and doesn`t even have one full album.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Husband and Wife Argument / Cell Phone! / Sexy Duo / Album
夫婦喧嘩 / けいたい! / セクシーデュオ / アルバム
